# Source everything :D

```{r}
source("./src/Source_Everything.R") # Load all functions
source("./LoadSamples.R") # Load samples and relations

# Install_Packages(packages) 
```


```{r}
Check_SampleName(samplesDF$SampleName)


diannReport <- Make_DiannReport(samplesDF, organism = "")
diannMatrix <- Make_DiannMatrix(diannReport, header = "Genes")

```

# Precursor x RT

```{r}
chromatogram <- Plot_Chromatogram(diannReport, fancyLabels, colors, cols = 5)

ggplot2::ggsave(
  filename = paste0("Chromatogram", ".png"),
  path = "./data/output/basic/",
  plot = chromatogram,
  width = 20, height = 10,
  units = "cm", dpi = 300
)

rm(chromatogram)
```

# Number of Peptides and proteins

```{r}
nPeptides <- Plot_nPeptides(diannReport, fancyLabels, colors)
nProteins <- Plot_nProteins(diannReport, labels = NULL, colors)

combine <- patchwork::wrap_plots(nPeptides, nProteins, ncol = 2)

ggplot2::ggsave(
  filename = paste0("number_peptides_and_proteins", ".png"),
  path = "./data/output/basic/",
  plot = combine,
  width = 20, height = 10,
  units = "cm", dpi = 300
)

rm(nPeptides, nProteins, combine)
```
